docs.snippet: A racehorse died Thursday at Churchill Downs after a freak fall that the trainer blamed on the sound of a starting gate bell blaring on the track's new sound system....
docs.lead_paragraph: A racehorse died Thursday at Churchill Downs after a freak fall that the trainer blamed on the sound of a starting gate bell blaring on the track's new sound system.

headline.main: Horse Dies in Freak Fall at Churchill Downs
headline.print_headline: Horse Dies in Freak Fall at Churchill Downs

docs.snippet: Free-to-air TV coverage is essential if Super Rugby wants to build its profile in Asia sufficiently for the continent to host a team over the next five to 10 years, the head of the ARFU has told Reuters....
docs.lead_paragraph: Free-to-air TV coverage is essential if Super Rugby wants to build its profile in Asia sufficiently for the continent to host a team over the next five to 10 years, the head of the ARFU has told Reuters.

headline.main: Richie Who? Lack of TV Coverage Hinders Asia's Super Rugby Bid
headline.print_headline: Richie Who? Lack of TV Coverage Hinders Asia's Super Rugby Bid

docs.snippet: A growing number of high school students have discovered an alternative route to college through fringe sports like rugby....
docs.lead_paragraph: A growing number of high school students have discovered an alternative route to college through fringe sports like rugby.
docs.abstract: Growing number of high school students have discovered an alternative route to college through fringe sports like rugby; more than 180 collegiate rugby clubs have started in the last four years, creating more financial aid opportunities; roughly 100 women and 75 men across the country, including many minorities, received rugby scholarships in 2013.
